greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of digits of 6^n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) = A007953(A000400(n)). - _Michel Marcus_, Nov 01 2013 [corrected by _Georg Fischer_, Dec 28 2020]
program: (PARI) SumD(x)= { local(s=0); while (x>9, s+=x%10; x\=10); return(s + x) } { for (n=0, 1000, a=SumD(6^n); write("b066002.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Nov 06 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 11 2001
